publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4573 Ms Maureen Watt: Refugee Week 2006—That the Parliament recognises that 19 to 25 June is Refugee Week 2006, which consists of a programme of arts, cultural and educational events that celebrate the contribution of refugees; notes that Scotland has long been heralded as a nation that offers support, understanding and sanctuary to people in great need and peril and also recognises the vital contribution that refugees have brought to Scotland, and hopes that Scotland will forever be seen worldwide as a bastion of hope and understanding. Supported by: Colin Fox*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mike Rumbles*, Bruce Crawford*, Fergus Ewing*, Jim Mather*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Shiona Baird*, Brian Adam*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Nora Radcliffe*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*, Patrick Harvie*, Christine Grahame*

S2M-4573 Refugee Week 2006 (lodged on 19 June 2006) Tommy Sheridan*, Robin Harper*, Mark Ballard*, Alex Neil*, Michael Matheson*, Mike Pringle*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Sandra White*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4573 Refugee Week 2006 (lodged on 19 June 2006) Mr John Swinney*
S2M-4573 Refugee Week 2006 (lodged on 19 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4573 Ms Maureen Watt: Refugee Week 2006—That the Parliament recognises that 19 to 25 June is Refugee Week 2006, which consists of a programme of arts, cultural and educational events that celebrate the contribution of refugees; notes that Scotland has long been heralded as a nation that offers support, understanding and sanctuary to people in great need and peril and also recognises the vital contribution that refugees have brought to Scotland, and hopes that Scotland will forever be seen worldwide as a bastion of hope and understanding. Supported by: Colin Fox, Roseanna Cunningham, Stewart Stevenson, Mike Rumbles, Bruce Crawford, Fergus Ewing, Jim Mather, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Shiona Baird, Brian Adam, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Nora Radcliffe, Rob Gibson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance, Patrick Harvie, Christine Grahame, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper, Mark Ballard, Alex Neil, Michael Matheson, Mike Pringle, Eleanor Scott, Ms Sandra White, Richard Lochhead, Mr Mark Ruskell, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr John Swinney, Donald Gorrie
S2M-4573 Refugee Week 2006 (lodged on 19 June 2006) Linda Fabiani*
